title: Burrillville/Oakland – Three Bed Duplex - $1,195
description: **Available immediately**
• This three level duplex includes over 1,200 sq. feet of comfortable living space with much of the original woodwork throughout
• Eat-in kitchen with new laminate flooring, good cabinet/counter space, and separate mudroom and breezeway areas
• Bright and sunny family room with warm, over-sized windows
• Separate formal dining room with plenty of space for full table and chairs or utilize it as play area or study
• Spotless bath with full tub, new flooring and new vanity/sink
• Three beds on top floor with warm carpet and ample closet space
• Oil heat with efficient hot-air furnace system and electric hot water
• Laundry hook-ups in basement
• Front farmers porch for your outdoor furniture!!
• Two off-street parking spots with plenty of on-street parking
• Owner maintains landscape/yard – tenant responsible for snow removal
• No Pets
• Located in the Oakland neighborhood of Burrillville. Very quiet area, just minutes to RT 7 and 295
